headline: Online Tip
subtitle: Three Ways to Earn Cash Quickly
content:
If you are ever short of enough cash to do a Job, remember that there are many ways to make quick cash, including:

- Hold Up any of the stores marked on the Radar. If you wear a mask you can avoid being recognised on return visits.
- Simeon often needs specific vehicles for his business â€“ If you can find certain models he will pay for them (check your Texts)
- Non-premium vehicles can be sold to Los Santos Customs.
